info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 10 at 11:44AM MST until October 10 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for Jacks Canyon... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Navajo County in north central Arizona...
* Until 145 PM MST.
* At 1144 AM MST, A stream gauge along Jacks Canyon continues to report a 5 foot rise in water. Between 0.75 and 1.25 inches of rain have fallen across the basin. Flash flooding is ongoing and will continue along Jacks Canyon toward Winslow.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Gauges reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, normally dry washes, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Winslow, Sunset Pass, Jacks Canyon, Clear Creek Reservoir and Homolovi Ruins State Park.
This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 257 and 258. Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 256 and 257. State Route 99 between mile markers 39 and 41. State Route 87 between mile markers 317 and 339...and near mile marker 346.
This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Clear Creek, Cottonwood Wash, Little Colorado River and Jacks Canyon.
info.instruction:
Flooding of washes and creeks will occur, some dirt roads will become muddy and impassable. Paved roads and underpasses could become flooded as well.
Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 1:45 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 1:45 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 1:45 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 1:45 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
